unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: Prom Costs: Upper Bound of Confidence Interval
question_text: A group of students decided to construct a confidence interval to estimate the average cost of attending prom in their area.  To gather data they surveyed a random sample of students who attended prom and surveyed them about how much they had spent. If the sample mean was $\$914.32$ and the lower bound of their confidence interval was $\$863.57$ , what was the largest cost estimated by the confidence interval?
